name: Metropolitan Recycling
description: Metropolitan recycling offers a variety of recycling services to help businesses reduce their waste and carbon footprint. Multiple size containers and pick-up schedules are available to institutions and businesses.

name: The Environmental Recycling of NY
description: The Environmental Recycling of NY is a Bottle and Can Redemption center in Brooklyn. They accept all aluminum, glass and plastic containers and will schedule a pickup if you have more than 2000 containers.

name: Scholes Street Recycling
description: Scholes Street Recycling is a full service recycling facility with the goal of recycling 100% of everything that goes into their facility. They are a receiver of all types of recycling materials and have an unlimited capacity of baling.

name: Uwv Recycling
description: Uwv Recycling is a Recycling Program that collects donations of gently used clothing and household goods.

name: 4THBIN
description: 4THBIN is a certified and accredited secure e-recycling solution provider for over 6,000 businesses across the United States.

name: Boro Park Redemption Center
description: Boro Park Redemption Center accepts NYC redeemable bottles. Separate your recyclables by material into clear bags to bring them into this center. They are now offering $0.06 on plastic and can items above 1000 pieces.

name: Sure We Can
description: Sure We Can is a nonprofit recycling center, community space and sustainability hub in Brooklyn. They have served the community of canners for over 15 years and today it has evolved into a community center that promotes a sustainable urban culture and facilitates an urban economy.

name: Walter Electronics Recycling
description: Walter Electronics Recycling is a benefit corporation and helps individuals and organizations dispose of their electronics. They safely and responsibly dispose of used electronics and offer zero landfill recycling services which meet the highest environmental standards.

name: Computer Recycling
description: Computer Recycling is a leading electronic recycling and computer recycling company. They are committed to helping customers dispose of obsolete or unwanted electronic equipment.

name: Queen City Recycling
description: Queen City Recycling is a family-owned recycling center for private and commercial local contractors. They can handle all of your recycling, rubbish removal, and container service needs. They accept all construction and demolition debris.
